question.text:
Match the geometry (given in column A ) with the complexes (given in column B ) in:
  Geometry: A   Complex: B
I Octahedral (P) [Ni(CN)4]2-
II Square planar (Q) Ni(CO)4
III Tetrahedral (R) [Fe(CN)6]4-

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Q</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></math>

solution.text: In <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">e</mi></math> is in <math><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn></math> state with elctronic configuration <math><mn>4</mn><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi></mrow></msup><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></msup></math> and <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> is strong ligand causes inward pairing, thus shows <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math> , Octahedral. <math><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math> is <math><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></math> tetrahedral and <math><mo>[</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><msup><mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math> is <math><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></math> , square planar.
